titleStmt.title: The advice and direction of both Hovses of Parliament to Sir William Brereton and to the rest of the deputy lieutenants for the county of Chester with orders of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for the regulating of those souldiers that are gon or shall goe under the command of His Excellency Robert Earle of Essex, Lord generall for this expedition.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
